clinical_study.brief_title: Audit of Management of First Stage of Labour in Assiut University Hospitals : a Quality Improvement Project
clinical_study.official_title: Audit of Management of First Stage of Labour in Assiut University Hospitals : a Quality Improvement Project

brief_summary.textblock: auditing the current management of first stage of normal vaginal deliveries at Assiut university hospitals emergency obstetric care

detailed_description.textblock: Clinical auditing is a quality improvement process that involves reviewing the delivery of healthcare to ensure the best practice is being carried out . it is agreed that caesarean section rates are above the nationally accepted in Egypt . This can be related to many factors and can be associated with risks to morbidities and mortalities

primary_outcome.measure: measure performance according to gold standers
primary_outcome.description: measure performance and adherence to gold standers during management of first stage of labour in assuit university hospitals

secondary_outcome.measure: introduction of NICE guidelines in practice
secondary_outcome.description: introduction of NICE guidelines in management of first stage of labour in practice in assuit university hospitals

arm_group.arm_group_label: Nice clinical guidelines for intrapartum care for healthy women and babies
arm_group.description: define gold standards in intrapartum care for healthy women and babies

arm_group.arm_group_label: performance in the care provided to patients in periods of audit
arm_group.description: measure performance in the care provided to the patients in the period of audit

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- term 37- 41 weeks primigravida single vertex presentation living fetus spontaneous onset no contraindications for vaginal delivary
Exclusion Criteria:
- women with associated co morbidities pre eclampsia and diabetes IUFD previous uterine scar intrauterine growth restriction
